definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: It is discussed how to apply intelligent regulator to control the combustion value of mixing gas.
sentences.chinese: 詣在探討應用智能調節器控制混合煤氣熱值。

sentences.english: Combustibility of producer gas is compared with other fuel gas to use rationally low calorific value gas.
sentences.chinese: 對其燃燒特性進行比較，以利於合理使用低熱值煤氣。

sentences.english: Both coal gangue and coal bed methane are low heating value fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石和含甲烷量較低的煤層氣均屬於低熱值的燃料。

sentences.english: The extensive utilization of lower-grade fuels is at present our national energy policy.
sentences.chinese: 充分利用低熱值燃料是目前國家的能源政策之一。

sentences.english: Study on the Caloric Value of Organs at the Different Development Stages of Moringa sp.
sentences.chinese: 辣木植物器官不同發育階段的熱值研究。

sentences.english: The calorific value of Medicago populations from northern Xingjiang and cultivars were measured using Parr measurement.
sentences.chinese: 用氧彈式自動測熱儀測定苜蓿不同種羣植物體的熱值。

sentences.english: Test of dewatering performance and heat value of sludge was carried out by using addition of dewatering conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 採用加入脫水調理劑對污泥脫水性能和熱值進行試驗。

sentences.english: Correspondingly, there is an increase in LHV and density of gas.
sentences.chinese: 並且水蒸氣熱解明顯提高了產氣的熱值和密度。

sentences.english: The minimum temperature showed the negative impact on the early rice caloric value with great variation.
sentences.chinese: 最低溫度對熱值具負影響作用，表現出大的變異係數。

sentences.english: The principle and method of the caloric value control system of the gas mixing station of Panzhihua Iron &Steel Co. are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了攀鋼煤氣混合站熱值控制系統的原理及方法。
